Articles.Content:
I use KSP 1.4.xx, with the MemGraph mod. 

When using my Logitech Extreme3dPro, the inputs and everything NORMALLY work fine. However in certain instances while playing the controller remaps itself. 

Instance 1: When choosing the Launchpad with an existing craft, none of the inputs work, my trigger is remapped to timewarp+  a workaround is that I have to recover/relaunch the craft to get them to work properly. 

Instance 2: After loading a craft onto the launchpad, and using time warp on ground, the controls once again remap themselves and i cant control the craft until i recover/relaunch.

Instance 3: Ingame, sometimes when i go to map my joystick, it will register keyboard inputs instead of the proper joystick until i reset the game. 

Now in windows, the joystick is always operating fine, i test all buttons in a text field and none of them cause me to type keystrokes. I check my Logitech game profiler, that has not changed, just the ingame input. 

 

Is there a fix instead of the workarounds i have mentioned?
